articles.author: Crispian Balmer
articles.title: 'Heat storm' stretches into southern Europe, health alerts issued - Reuters
articles.description: Italy issued hot weather red alerts for 16 cities on Sunday, with meteorologists warning that temperatures will hit record highs across southern Europe in the coming days.
articles.content:
ROME, July 16 (Reuters) - Italy issued hot weather red alerts for 16 cities on Sunday, with meteorologists warning that temperatures will hit record highs across southern Europe in the coming days.

articles.title: Hollywood actors' strike: entertainment desert looms and pain will spread wider - The Guardian
articles.description: The walkout by writers and screen stars won’t affect just the US film industry but production in UK and Europe
articles.content: There will be no fresh helpings of The White Lotus, The Last of Us or even Emily in Paris beaming into front rooms when summer fades. Nor will a screen version of the musical Wicked, starring Ariana … [+12924 chars]
